description: A Webpack configuration file for NativeScript projects, configuring the build environment and resolution settings.

methods.name: module.exports
methods.description: Exports a function that initializes Webpack with the given environment and returns the resolved configuration.

methods.name: webpack.init
methods.description: Initializes the Webpack configuration with environment variables.

methods.name: webpack.resolveConfig
methods.description: Resolves and returns the Webpack configuration object.
